Wouldn't it be possible to create a simple CWalletLoader class in walletdb.h, with only virtual functions, have CWallet implement CWalletLoader and then let CWalletDB::LoadWallet take a CWalletLoader\* argument?\n

CWalletDB really should just be doing serialization

Walletdb's responsibility is knowing the file format (what keys correspond to what, interacting with BDB, ...).
